thread.title: Pizza and soccer on agenda for Celtics on trip to Italy
thread.title_full: Pizza and soccer on agenda for Celtics on trip to Italy

title: Pizza and soccer on agenda for Celtics on trip to Italy
text:
> Top News Pizza and soccer on agenda for Celtics on trip to Italy Boston Celtics' Perry Jones plays during an exhibition on the occasion of the 'NBA Special Olympic Basketball Clinic' in Milan, Italy, Saturday, Oct. 3 , 2015. (AP Photo/Luca Bruno) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
